thud.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the low sound made by a heavy object hitting something else
thud.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: His head hit the floor with a sickening thud.
There was a dull thud as the box hit the floor.
thud.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to hit something with a low sound
thud.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The stone thudded to the ground.
waves thudding against the side of the ship
thud.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to walk or run with your feet making a heavy sound as they touch the ground
thud.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: A horse thudded over the frozen grass.
thud.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: if your heart thuds, it beats strongly because you are excited or frightened
thud.translation[1].definitions[2].examp: Peter was aware of his heart thudding in his chest.
